text:
San Francisco | Full-time | C++/C#/Xamarin

Genomics it's good stuff. We made some tools that are better than what academics/gov/big companies make.

Desktop applications, not web or "cloud"-- b/c you make video games and movies with desktop applications, so maybe when lives depend on it skip the web browser.

Anyways you'll get paid market-rate and get to work with fun technologies.

You can email me: mo_r [at] me.com
